description:
My place is located in Midtown Manhattan. You’ll love my place because of its convenient location. It is walking distance to restaurants, coffee shops, shopping malls, and touristic places. It has security at the entrance. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Its convenient location. The bedroom and living area is separated.

Most of the areas except the ones I mark as private.

You can find anything : restaurants, supermarkets, subway, and bars

Bus and subway

I am a graduate student at NYU School of Medicine.
name: Large studio in Midtown Manhattan
review: Close to the medical campus. Nice sized apartment. Easy to find. Would recommend if you need a place to stay.
